title: 731. Week 7 Big Games, NFC Division Leaders & Rookie QB Report Card
itunes:title: 731. Week 7 Big Games, NFC Division Leaders & Rookie QB Report Card
description:
Daniel Jeremiah, Bucky Brooks and Rhett Lewis look back at the weekend and all the action from Week 7 of the NFL season. The guys start by breaking down the big 3 games from Sunday. Next, the trio focus on the NFC division leaders and play a game where they pick the quarterback, offensive weapons, a play caller and defense among the teams. After that, the guys discuss 8 Halloween themed topics from the week. Then, the trio give a grade to the rookies that played based off their Week 7 performances. To wrap up the show, the guys talk about a few teams on a bye in Week 7 and 8, while touching on what they need to improve on.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
